item.description:
Do You love Robots….. join us for the Boston FIRST Regional Robot Competition

Sponsored by: Boston University, National Grid, PTC, Draper Laboratory, MIT Lincoln Laboratory, Google, Textron Systems, MathWorks, Philips Color Kinetics, Hitachi and Artisan’s Asylum

Be a part of the action at Boston University’s Agganis Arena for the 2013 Boston FIRST Regional Competition! Watch as 52 teams from the US, Brazil, and Canada compete in this year’s game, ULTIMATE ASCENT.

Student-built robots will vie for numerous honors and awards before the tournament culminates in the exciting elimination rounds on Saturday afternoon. The event is free and open to everyone. Don’t miss it! Opening Ceremonies begin 8:30 AM Friday and Saturday Elimination rounds begin at 1:30 PM on Saturday. There will be a 30 minute lunch time show not to be missed around noon time, last year surprise show was the Blue Man Group!

Full event information at http://www.bostonfirst.org

Watch an animation explaining this year’s game on YouTube at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=itHNW2OFr4Y

Note: Biagio will be in the front lobby showcasing his art from 9AM till 1PM. So I'll be busy for the most part so come by say high and I'l tell you what to go se and do. OK!
item.how_to_find_us: Biagio will be in the front lobby showcasing his art from 9AM till 1PM. You can swing by before 11AM to check out my Art too!
item.name: Do You love Robots….. join us for the Boston FIRST Regional Robot Competition
